Instruction: In a large resealable plastic bag, mix together ginger, garlic, soy sauce, orange juice, honey, and green onion; combine thoroughly. Add salmon to the bag and seal securely. Gently turn the bag to evenly coat the salmon with the marinade. Chill in the refrigerator for 15 to 30 minutes.
Remove salmon from the marinade and place on the preheated grill. Cook for 5 to 7 minutes on each side, or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
After grilling the salmon, remove it from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
